Annotation Interface RequiresRole

@Target({METHOD,TYPE}) @Retention(RUNTIME) public @interface RequiresRole
Annotation to mark gRPC methods that require specific roles. Apply to service implementation methods to enforce role-based access control. Example:

  • Required Element Summary

    Required Elements
    Modifier and Type
    Required Element
    Description
    String[]
    value
    The roles required to access this method.

  • Optional Element Summary

    Optional Elements
    Modifier and Type
    Optional Element
    Description
    boolean
    requireAll
    If true, user must have ALL specified roles.

  • Element Details

    • value

      String[] value
      The roles required to access this method. User must have at least one.

    • requireAll

      boolean requireAll
      If true, user must have ALL specified roles. If false (default), user must have at least ONE of the specified roles.
      Default:
      false
